metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23903 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A Divide by Zero vulnerability in the function static int read_samples of Speex v1.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS) via a crafted WAV file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-23903` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspeex1 - 1.2~rc1.2-1.1ubuntu1.21.10.1
libspeexdsp1 - 1.2~rc1.2-1.1ubuntu1.21.10.1
speex - 1.2~rc1.2-1.1ubuntu1.21.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: speex package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2~rc1.2-1.1ubuntu1.21.10.1').
